unnormalised: Bore, mhaka fatt'tchintan asa ki azkalchea e-commerce site-ancher asloleo pishyachyo ankddeank dusre koxe samballttat? Zoxe ki, gambhirtayen, mhaka Flipkart-acher ek novea phone-ak sodtalem, thik asa? Ani kimati sogllekodden astaleo.
normalised: Okay, mhunnllear maka fattim zaanvchem poddlem e-commerce site-ancher challeo asloleo ankdde koxe sambhallttat? Mhunnllear, gambhirayen, mhunnllear hanv Flipkart-acher navo phone sodto aslo, barabar? Ani kimti choddun-unnun astaleo.

unnormalised: Poile, Samsung phone-acher hi "special offer" asli, Rs. 25000-antlean Rs. 19999-ak kam kelolem. Zoxe ki, kiteak tem ₹20000-ak round-up korunk favona? Tem khorem discount korun dilem nant mhunn dista. Magir mhaka dusro phone ₹32,472.75-ant mell'llo. Sattor poishe? Khorench? Konn taka addim lakx ditat? Tem fatt'tchintan vaddoita.
normalised: Poilem, Samsung phone-acher ek “khas offer” asli, ponchvees hozaar rupyanchem rupya unnis hozaar nauxim navad’deak odik rupyanchem bhes zaunk na. Mhunnllear, rupya vees hozaarak kiteak bhovtun gheunk na? Tem dekhavpak kitench discount dita. Magir hanv ek dusro phone rupya tettiis hozaar chounxim satt’taar rupya ani pontt satter poisancho price tag astana dekhlem. Satters poiso? Khorench? Atam konn taka dhyaan diita? Tem fuddleantlem sanddachem.

unnormalised: Ani magir "bank offers" astatt je sodanch gonda ghaltat. ICICI Bank credit card-ancher Rs. 1500 poriant 10% off melltta. Thik asa, borem. Tor, zaka hanv ₹20000-ak kitem-i ghet'ta, taka mhaka pure Rs. 1500 off mellttat? Vo tem fokot kharedi kimatacho 10% astalo, zo ₹2000 zat'to, punn Rs. 1500-ak cap kelolo? Mhojem mathhem bhonvonk lagta!
normalised: Ani magir “bank offer” asat teo sodanch khatt-pitteo asat. I-C-I-C-I Bank credit card-acher dha percent rupya ek hozaar panchxim meren discount melltta. Okay, borem asa. Mhunnllear, agar hanv rupya vees hozaarak kiteim gheton, maka pura rupya ek hozaar panchxim discount mellttalem? Vo tem keval kharedi kimtiche dha percent asat, je rupya don hozaar zatolem, punn rupya ek hozaar panchxim meren cap kel’lem asa? Mhojem taleachem bhomvtonk suru zata!

unnormalised: Delivery charge-ancher mhaka suruvat korunk favona. Rs. 499 voilea order-ancher free delivery. Khorench? Tor, mhojem total Rs. 498 asa, mhaka delivery fee talnacho fatt'tchint korunk dodat kitem-i add korunk poddtta? Hem zoxe te ek game khellttat. Ani cashback offers! Tumchea poilea UPI transaction-acher Rs. 50 cashback melltta. Tem zoxe ki, dhanyavad, punn taka fokot panchais rupyanka ek noven UPI account setup korpacho tras korpacho zago asa?
normalised: Ani tumi delivery charge vixim sodanch sangonakai. Rupya charxim navad’deak voir order-cher free delivery. Khorench? Mhunnllear, agar mhojem total rupya charxim navad’deak kam asat, hanv delivery fee zoddpi korunk ek dusro vostu add korunk zai? Tem khella khelta ani cashback offer! Tumchea poile U-P-I transaction-acher rupya pong’ga cashback melltta. Tem asa tori, punn keval pong’ga rupyak khatir navo U-P-I account setup korunk zai?

unnormalised: Khorench, kednaim mhaka dista ki mhaka calculator ani e-commerce pricing-ant PhD zai hanv khorench borem deal melloun asa mhunn sodunk. Konnak-i ani hem dislolem asa? Tumchea strategio hea digital marketplace-ank vatt korpak ani borem kimat mellounk kitea? Mhojem uloitat tumi aikun mhaka sangata hanv hea sankhyancho zonvgalant ekloch nant!
normalised: Khorench, kiteak maka calculator ani e-commerce pricing-acher ek P-H-D zai mhunn dislam agar hanv ek bori deal korta. Kitem konn dusreak oxem dislam? Digiital marketplace-ak sambhallunk tumchi strategy kitem, ani bori kimot sodunk? Sang mhaka hanv eklleanuch numerichi zonglaat na!
